actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Education, Arts, Humanities.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from Education Department, OMB.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Education, Arts and Humanities

official_title: A bill to permit certain payments under the Act of September 30, 1950 (Public Law 874, 81st Congress) based on incorrect determinations under section 2(a)(1)(C) of that Act.

summary.text: Ratifies certain payments made prior to FY 1986 to certain local educational agencies in areas affected by Federal activities even though the payments were based on incorrect determinations related to the assessed valuation of real property within the relevant school district.

titles.title: A bill to permit certain payments under the Act of September 30, 1950 (Public Law 874, 81st Congress) based on incorrect determinations under section 2(a)(1)(C) of that Act.
